Posts.EditableText: I'll be at this event in London on 15th/16th Dec: http://www.indiegogo.com/adventurex2012 It still needs funding, and you can donate at the link above - but otherwise it's free to enter. Who is coming?
Posts.HTML:

It still needs funding, and you can donate at the link above - but otherwise it's free to enter.

Posts.EditableText: It would be fun to organise an event like this here in Canada. Would you be up for travelling if that could be arranged, Alex?

Posts.EditableText: Is it too late to contribute at least? I don't know if I can make it, but I wanted to donate. Not sure if it's just me, but I've been to the page and even Facebook-logged in, and I can't for the life of me figure out how to make a donation.
